SEARCH
Module PIXL.POS
Package teampixl.com.pixlpos.database.api

Class MenuAPI

java.lang.Object
teampixl.com.pixlpos.database.api.MenuAPI
public class MenuAPI extends Object
The MenuAPI class is a singleton responsible for managing menu items in memory. It provides methods to create, read, update, and delete menu items, with robust validation and error handling.

    • postMenuItem

      public List<StatusCode> postMenuItem(String MENU_ITEM_NAME, Double MENU_ITEM_PRICE, boolean ACTIVE_ITEM, MenuItem.ItemType MENU_ITEM_TYPE, String MENU_ITEM_DESCRIPTION, String MENU_ITEM_NOTES, MenuItem.DietaryRequirement DIETARY_REQUIREMENT)
      Creates a new menu item and adds it to the database.
      Parameters:
      MENU_ITEM_NAME - the name of the menu item
      MENU_ITEM_PRICE - the price of the menu item
      ACTIVE_ITEM - the active status of the menu item
      MENU_ITEM_TYPE - the type of the menu item (ItemType)
      MENU_ITEM_DESCRIPTION - the description of the menu item
      MENU_ITEM_NOTES - the notes for the menu item
      DIETARY_REQUIREMENT - the dietary requirement of the menu item
      Returns:
      a list of status codes indicating the result of the operation

    • postMenuItem

      public List<StatusCode> postMenuItem(String MENU_ITEM_NAME, Double MENU_ITEM_PRICE, MenuItem.ItemType MENU_ITEM_TYPE, String MENU_ITEM_DESCRIPTION)
      Overloaded method to create a new menu item with minimal parameters.
      Parameters:
      MENU_ITEM_NAME - the name of the menu item
      MENU_ITEM_PRICE - the price of the menu item
      MENU_ITEM_TYPE - the type of the menu item
      MENU_ITEM_DESCRIPTION - the description of the menu item
      Returns:
      a list of status codes indicating the result of the operation
